reviews.text: Amazing food, alright service. The double burger, truffle fries, and brownie shake were very good. Server was not the best and took a while to get the food.

Good food, neat decor. Our burgers were cooked to a perfection. Fries were enough to share. 

The service was great, she was super quick to refill drinks...

The service here was really great!!!! All of the staff from when I walked in to when I walked out were nice and accommodating!!! My food was good!
